import { arrProducts } from "../../Service/products" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import './product.css' export default function ProductsItems() { const [arrProd, setArrProd] = useState(arrProducts) return
{arrProd.map((item) => { return

{item.name}

{item.cardDescription}

Rp.{item.price} Rp.{item.oldPrice}
})}
{[1,2,3,4].map((item, index, arr) => { arr.length === index + 1 ? 'Next' : item })}
}
